DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date that the biospecimens were received in processing.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The act of preparing or putting through a prescribed procedure._A position in relation to its surroundings._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of preparing or putting through a prescribed procedure.:A position in relation to its surroundings.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: The act of preparing or putting through a prescribed procedure.
A position in relation to its surroundings.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Concepts linked to Tissue Banking and Pathology activities

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
